short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Look up definitions for Japanese words you encounter on the web. Add the word to Anki.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yomikiri is a Japanese immersion learning tool. 

As you browse the internet and encounter words you don't know, you can look up the word definitions with Yomikiri and add the word to Anki flashcards.

Hover over the Japanese word while pressing shift to view definitions. 

Features:
- Hover over a word to view definition. It recognizes word boundaries within sentence.
- Search words and sentences in popup.
- Add word to Anki flashcards using AnkiConnect add-on.
  - You can preview and edit the note before adding.
  - If Anki is not running, notes are stored and automatically added later. You don't have to keep Anki running in the background all the time.
- Customizable Anki note template.
- Translate sentence
- View relevant grammar with a link to Tofugu.
